summary: Oscar-winning musical chronicle that brilliantly captures the three-day rock concert and celebration of peace and love that became a capstone for the Sixties.
cast: Richie Havens|Joan Baez|The Who|Sha-Na-Na|Joe Cocker|Country Joe and the Fish|Arlo Guthrie|Crosby Stills & Nash|Ten Years After|John Sebastian|Santana|Sly and the Family Stone|Jimi Hendrix|Canned Heat|Bob Davis|Bob Davis|Lilli Georgescu|Jefferson Airplane|Janis Joplin|Harvey Mandel|John Morris|Richard Alvarez|Jose Chepito Areas|Lennie Baker|Bruce Barthol|David Brown|Mike Carabello|Chick Churchill|Johnny Contardo|Alan Cooper|David Crosby|Roger Daltrey|John Entwistle|Lawrence Ferlinghetti|Jerry Garcia|Bill Graham|Wavy Gravy|Frederick 'Dennis' Greene|Justin Kreutzmann|Michael Lang|Alvin Lee|Ric Lee|Rob Leonard|Leo Lyons|Jocko Marcellino|Country Joe McDonald|Barry Melton|Chip Monck|Keith Moon|Graham Nash|Al Parker|Scott Powell|Gregg Rolie|Carlos Santana|Swami Satchidananda|Michael Shrieve|'Screamin' Scott' Simon|Stephen Stills|Sly Stone|Pete Townshend|Sidney Westerfield|Max Yasgur|Donald 'Donny' York
title: Woodstock
